mapper.select: select * from fit_member where mem_state = 'Y' order by mem_subdate desc
mapper.insert: insert into fit_member (mem_email, mem_password, mem_name, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_address, mem_gender, mem_subdate, mem_photo) values (#{memEmail}, #{memPassword}, #{memName}, #{memBirth}, #{memPhone}, #{memAddress}, #{memGender}, #{memSubDate}, #{memPhoto})
mapper.update: update fit_member set mem_password = #{memPassword} where mem_email = #{memEmail}
update fit_member set mem_phone = #{memPhone} where mem_email = #{memEmail}
